TopicTitle: How to have vessel point UP?

Articles.Content:
I want a vessel to point up, using SAS.  So I have this code: 

vessel.Autopilot.SetMode(VesselAutopilot.AutopilotMode.StabilityAssist);
                
Vector3d worldUp = vessel.ReferenceTransform.position - this.vessel.mainBody.position;                
vessel.Autopilot.SAS.LockRotation(Quaternion.LookRotation(worldUp));

But I get a message instead, saying:

"Cannot set autopilot value, pilot/probe does not support retrograde, or there is no node/target"

I tried reversing the "worldUp" values, no change.

What about 

vessel.Autopilot.SetMode(VesselAutopilot.AutopilotMode.RadialOut);

?
